sc.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller is the controller of simpleCount Application.

    Controller handle :

    • Keyboard Input
    • ButtonAction Input
    • MenuBar Input

    The class Controller send commands to the model to update the model's state.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    bechad_p
